fields.name: Server Name
fields.description: The display name for this server instance.

fields.name: Game Template
fields.description: The game template to use, or null if not set.

fields.name: Docker Image
fields.description: The Docker image to use for the server.

fields.name: Game Steam ID
fields.description: The Steam App ID for Project Zomboid.

fields.name: Steam Branch Password
fields.description: Password for the Steam branch, if required.

fields.name: Server Args
fields.description: Additional arguments to pass to the server process.

fields.name: Auto Configure
fields.description: Whether to auto-configure the server on first run.

fields.name: Use Named Volume
fields.description: Whether to use a named Docker volume.

fields.name: Docker Volume Name
fields.description: The name of the Docker volume.

fields.name: Docker Volume Path
fields.description: The path inside the container where the volume is mounted.

fields.name: Bind Mount Path
fields.description: The host path to bind mount, or null if not used.

fields.name: Protocol Ports
fields.description: List of ports and protocols to expose.
